file_content.text: Thanks for your help. The separatists won't know what hit them.
The drones I had watching the warehouse picked up the explosion. You succeeded.
What's your next move?
This was a huge blow to the separatists. Their plans will be pushed back by a year.
Of course I did.
It wasn't easy.
You put Kata out of business. That's the important thing. I only wish the same could be said about the separatists.
But we've put their operations back by at least a year.
I'll use that time to infiltrate their operations, take them down from the inside. Thanks again.
You'd better get a move on. I want Kata out of the picture as soon as possible.
Master Jedi! Jatta Kuum--Strategic Information Service.
Hey, spacer. Could use someone with street smarts. My name's Jatta Kuum--I'm with the Strategic Information Service.
Sir! It's an honor. Jatta Kuum--Strategic Information Service.
Finally! Someone who might be able to make a difference. My name's Jatta Kuum--I'm with the Strategic Information Service.
You've heard about the various separatist movements, yes? Discontents trying to break away from the Republic?
Lately, it's gotten serious. Dozens of possible mini-wars within the Republic.
Fighting amongst ourselves only strengthens the enemy.
This must not happen.
Plays right into the Empire's hands--and they know it.
There's too much bloodshed already.
This must not happen.
That's why I'm trying to stop the situation from deteriorating.
Fighting amongst ourselves gives a tactical advantage to the enemy.
Another war is a mistake.
That's why I'm trying to stop them.
I'm sure the Empire would just love that.
The Empire would love that.
Exactly. It's like fighting two wars at once.
Who are these separatists?
Separatists?
The disaffected. The dissatisfied. Opportunists. People who think the Republic isn't serving their needs anymore.
That's a bit extreme.
The separatists are growing and becoming more violent every day.
Most of their funding comes from right here. A local crime lord--Kata the Hutt.
He funnels the credits he makes from illegal pit fighting to Ord Mantell and other hot spots. The separatists use it to plan their next atrocity.
The only way to stop them is to stop the money.
Cut their funding.
Glad we're on the same wavelength.
Why don't you just lock him up?
Arrest the Hutt.
With his kind of money, he'd be out in hours. We want something more... permanent.
So what's the plan?
We take out his pit fighting business, he won't be able to fund the separatists anymore.
I tried once before, but things got too hot. Now I'm being watched. That's why I need you.
All Kata's important files--contacts, money, everything--are in a vault where he holds the fights. Destroy the vault, destroy the business.
Walk in the park. Kata's fights are done for.
Piece of cake.
Sounds simple enough.
It won't be easy. Guards, pit fighters, scum of the galaxy. Those guys won't fight fair.
Get in there, place this mine and stand back to watch peace break out all over the galaxy.
I can't help you. [Refuse quest.]
I see. Guess I'll have to find someone else, then.
No time to talk. I'm on official SIS business.
